column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH – Singer of the 1950’s and 1960’s
column7: at her home in Phnom Penh.------Keo Setha was born on January 1
column8: 1936 in Phnom Penh. She was the one of the pioneers of female Cambodian artistes in the 1950’s
column9: before better known names such as Ros Serey Sothea and Pen Ron broke onto the scene.------She was also among the first female stars to duet with ‘Emperor’ of Khmer pop music
